Patients six cariesfree maxillaryanterior teeth without restoration labial surface . Patients central incisor determine shade C2 darker Patient spontaneous dental pain . Patient anterior restoration non carious cervical lesion . Patient severe internal tooth discoloration ( tetracycline stain , fluorosis , pulpless teeth ) , bruxism habit .
